condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 105/003 Field Offices have improved capacity and resources to implement multi-sectoral programmes and humanitarian response at sub- national level

description.narrative: Programme efficiency and effectiveness were improved with increased capacity in coordinating and managing UNICEF emergency preparedness and response programmes across the country, including assistance to more than 900,000 Rohingya refugees and approximately 300,000 people from host communities in Cox's Bazar. Efficient partnerships with government and CSO partners, articulated around sustained capacity strengthening models, enabled sustainable delivery of services to affected communities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
